steps.descr: Cook onion in a large pan until soft

on_enter.say: Right, let's start by cooking the onion in a large pan until it's nice and soft. You'll know it's ready when it turns translucent and smells sweet.

steps.instructions: Cook onion in a large pan until soft

steps.descr: Add ground beef and cook until browned

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the ground beef to the pan. Cook it until it's beautifully browned and you can hear that lovely sizzle.

steps.instructions: Add ground beef and cook until browned

steps.descr: Stir in cumin, paprika, chili powder, salt and pepper

on_enter.say: Let's spice things up! Stir in the cumin, paprika, chili powder, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Give it a good mix so everything's well combined.

steps.instructions: Stir in cumin, paprika, chili powder, salt and pepper

steps.descr: Add a splash of water and simmer for 5 minutes

on_enter.say: Now, add a splash of water to the pan and let it simmer for 5 minutes. This will help all those lovely flavors meld together.

steps.instructions: Add a splash of water and simmer for 5 minutes

steps.descr: Warm tortillas in a dry pan

on_enter.say: Let's warm up those tortillas in a dry pan. You want them nice and pliable, ready to hold all that delicious filling.

steps.instructions: Warm tortillas in a dry pan

steps.descr: Fill tortillas with beef and your favorite toppings

on_enter.say: Now for the fun part! Fill each tortilla with the beef mixture and top with your favorite toppings. Get creative!

steps.instructions: Fill tortillas with beef and your favorite toppings

on_enter.say: Time to serve up these beautiful tacos with some lime wedges on the side. Enjoy every bite!

recipe.title: Beef Tacos
recipe.description: Mexican street-style tacos with seasoned ground beef and fresh toppings
